description: Enterprise techniques used by APT30, ATT&CK group G0013 v1.1
name: APT30 (G0013)

techniques.comment: [APT30](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0013) has used spearphishing emails with malicious DOC attachments.(Citation: FireEye APT30)
[APT30](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0013) has relied on users to execute malicious file attachments delivered via spearphishing emails.(Citation: FireEye APT30)
